description: This schema represents a data point.

data_body.description: The body of the data point. This object should conform to the schema identifier in the header property.

effective_time_frame.description: The time frame when this data_point occurred. When the HKSample `startDate` and `endDate` values are different, we recommend using the `time_interval` time frame property, and when they are the same, we recommend using the `date_time` time frame property.

header.description: The header of the data point.
